roleset.name: greet, accept, happily permitted
roleset.note: WELCOME-V NOTES: Frames file for 'welcome' based on financial subcorpus; adjectival 'welcome' based on BOLT-2,3. Member of Vncls admit-65, judgement-33. (from welcome.01-v)
WELCOME-N NOTES: Based on Bolt data. Comparison to welcome.01-v. Welcome.01-v is a member o VN classes admit-65 and judgement-33. Framedby Katie. (from welcome.01-n)
WELCOME-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on SMS. (from welcome.01-j)
WELCOMED-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from welcomed.01-j)

example.name: with arg2
example.text: *PRO* Welcome back to the second hour of Three Sixty.
example.arg: to the second hour of Three Sixty

example.name: With arg 2
example.text: Welcome to the ends sof the earth
example.arg: to the ends of the earth
